#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
#define rep(i,n) for(int i=0,_n=(n);i<_n;i++)
int kp(int wt,int* v,int* w,int n)
{
	 int knap [wt+1];
	knap[0]=0;
	rep(i,wt+1)
	knap[i]=999999999;
	knap[0]=0;
	for(int i=1;i<wt+1;i++)
	{    
	  rep(j,n)
	  {
	  	if(i>=w[j])
	  	knap[i]=min(knap[i],knap[i-w[j]]+v[j]);
	  }
		}
	return knap[wt];
}
int main()
{
	int t;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--)
	{
		int p,q;
		cin>>p>>q;
		int wt=q-p;
		int n;
		cin>>n;
		int* v=new int[n];
		int* w=new int[n];
		rep(i,n)
		{
		 cin>>v[i]>>w[i];
		}
	
	   int ans=kp(wt,v,w,n);
	   if(ans!=999999999||wt==0)
		cout<<"The minimum amount of money in the piggy-bank is "<<ans<<"."<<endl;
		else
				cout<<"This is impossible."<<endl;
	}
}
